Package com.guglielmoDelSarto.economics.utilityFunctions

Class PowerUtilityFunction

java.lang.Object
com.guglielmoDelSarto.economics.utilityFunctions.PowerUtilityFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
UtilityFunction
public class PowerUtilityFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements UtilityFunction
This class represent the famous 1D power utility function:
u(c) = c1 - γ / 1-γ
Since:
Version 1.0
Author:
Guglielmo Del Sarto
